resources.string: Nutrilight needs access to Your camera to scan product barcodes and give You instant information. We’ll only use it when You’re scanning!
Looks like You\'ve permanently denied camera access. Nutrilight needs it to scan product barcodes and provide quick details. Don\'t worry, we’ll only use it when You’re scanning.
Something went wrong with the scan. Please try again or check your connection.
Hold on, we\'re checking the ingredients...
